meanings.definition: Coming before all others in time or order
meanings.sent1: The first book on the shelf is mine.
meanings.sent2: She wore her first dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The first cat to arrive at the party was wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: His first attempt at painting was a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The first snowfall of the year covered the town in white.

meanings.sent1: My first was a birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The first of the month is always busy at work.
meanings.sent3: The first of the puppies to wake up started licking everyone's toes.
meanings.sent4: The first of the stars appeared in the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: Her first in the race earned her a gold medal.

meanings.definition: Before anything else in rank or importance
meanings.sent1: He always puts his family first.
meanings.sent2: Please finish your homework first before playing.
meanings.sent3: The cat always eats first, even before the dog.
meanings.sent4: She arrived first at the finish line, winning the race.
meanings.sent5: The safety of the passengers comes first in any emergency.
